attributes.action: Get Howard from the Halifax adverts off the telly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This guy is the slimiest, sickest individual on our screens. It wouldn't be so bad if he popped up once in a while, but every break on every channel we have to put up with his face and his singing. 
He puts the whole country off their dinners.
Get him off.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
